title: Audio Messed Up On Recorded Highlights
body: Just tried to record a highlight several times, aside from getting multiple bug splats during the process, the audio does not record. The sound that does play on the video highlight are static and a repeating clicking noise. Any advice or help would be amazing!!!

replies.body:
Our buddies in tech are familiar with this; the game must be getting bunk-code from elsewhere when trying to record the highlight. You'll want to perform a clean boot of your system to see if that helps out. The steps for that are [**right over here**](http://support.microsoft.com/kb/929135). Also, to ensure no other programs are interfering with the recording, try following these steps as well!
> Press [Windows Key] + R
> Type msconfig into the text bar at the bottom of the menu
> Click on the Services tab
> Check Hide all Microsoft services so you don't end up accidentally disabling a key process
> Click the Disable All button
> Click on the Startup tab
> Click on the Disable All button
> Click on the Apply button
> Click on the OK button
> Restart your computer
